scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix Experiment-4/auth-context-app && npm install --prefix Experiment-4/dark-mode-context && npm install --prefix Experiment-5 && npm install --prefix Experiment-6
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/Experiment-4/auth-context-app dist/Experiment-4/dark-mode-context dist/Experiment-5 dist/Experiment-6 && npm run install-all && npm run build:auth && npm run build:dark && npm run build:exp5 && npm run build:exp6
scripts.build:auth: cd Experiment-4/auth-context-app && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/Experiment-4/auth-context-app
scripts.build:dark: cd Experiment-4/dark-mode-context && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/Experiment-4/dark-mode-context
scripts.build:exp5: cd Experiment-5 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../dist/Experiment-5
scripts.build:exp6: cd Experiment-6 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../dist/Experiment-6
